value.name: PSUSD Officer Arrested in Domestic Extremism Probe Pleads Not Guilty
value.description: A Palm Springs Unified School District patrol officer arrested during an investigation into domestic extremism by an FBI Joint Terrorism Task Force pleaded not guilty on Monday to a felony weapons charge.
